attributes.action: abandon the idea of introducing UK road pricing taxation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir, my wife and I strongly object to the back handed method of introducing a road pricing scheme that your govenment are proposing. We wish to make known our dissatisfaction and register our objection to the Prime Minister immediately.  We understand that over a million people have already petitioned the Prime Minister and we wish to be added to that number.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
